channel.description: Recent content in Transatlantic Relations on Baltic Security Foundation

item.title: University Book Donation
item.description: The Baltic Security Foundation team shares their most recent books to universities around the world to promote the studies of regional security.

item.title: A Contrarian View of Joe Biden and NATO
item.description: In the world of analysis, contrarian viewpoints are equally disliked and necessary.
